alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 2:30PM EDT until May 27 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LANCASTER COUNTY... At 230 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gap, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... New Holland, Paradise, Strasburg, Gap, Terre Hill, Churchtown, Bowmansville, Intercourse, Christiana, Fivepointville, Blue Ball and Georgetown. This includes The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 288 to 295. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
